column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This is one of the many amazing gems on Montrose. It gets packed with many customers because it's an order at the kiosk and wait till it gets delivered type of cafe
column2: but it surely is worth the wait. There are an assortment of coffee and pastries with the most scrumptious entrees all made with very fresh ingredients. It is definitely the place to go when you want a refined yet very filling lunch!
